title: Quick and Easy Chicken Spaghetti Recipe
description: This chicken spaghetti recipe is quick and easy to make with cooked chicken, mushrooms, and pasta simmered in a creamy cheese sauce with tomatoes.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Main Dishes Pasta Chicken Quick and Easy Chicken Spaghetti 4.6 (257) 207 Reviews 24 Photos This chicken spaghetti recipe is quick and easy to make, yet is hearty and delicious. It's a great way to use leftover chicken! Submitted by Beamish Updated on November 12, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 24 24 24 24 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 15 mins Total Time: 25 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 1 (12 ounce) package angel hair pasta 2 cups chopped cooked chicken breast 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers ¬æ (8 ounce) package processed cheese, cubed ¬Ω (4 ounce) jar sliced mushrooms, drained salt and pepper to taste Directions Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook angel hair pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 4 to 5 minutes. Drain pasta and return it to the pot. Add chopped chicken, condensed soup, diced tomatoes with chile peppers, processed cheese, mushrooms, salt, and pepper. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook and stir over low heat until cheese is melted and mixture is heated through, about 5 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 504 home cooks made it! Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Quick and Easy Chicken Spaghetti 01 of 24 Photo by¬† dotdash meredith food studios 02 of 24 Photo by¬† SnappyOil4985 03/04/2024 A keeper! Easy to follow Family favorite My husband loved it!!! 03 of 24 Photo by¬† Evelyn Cordero 11/13/2023 Delicious!! A nice twist to chicken spaghetti! I added mushrooms, onions, garlic and cilantro as my veggies, used skinless, boneless chicken thighs instead chicken breast and Mexican blend Monterrey shredded cheese instead of the process cheese. It turned really creamy and delicious 04 of 24 Photo by¬† Lindsey Corwin 07/12/2023 This was awesome üòéüòÅü§òüèºI would totally make this every day if I wanted to ‚ù§Ô∏è ü•∞ 05 of 24 Photo by¬† Michelle Seace Traino 06/19/2021 06 of 24 Photo by¬† H. Biondo 12/31/2020 I made this for my boyfriend to try. We live in the North Pacific and he had never had it before. It was one of my favorite meals when I lived in the south though. I added a can of cream of mushroom to the mix and it made it that much better. He said it was amazing. 07 of 24 Photo by¬† Angie Obryant 11/28/2020 08 of 24 Photo by¬† Carol Bethea 10/24/2020 09 of 24 Photo by¬† Carol Bethea 10/24/2020 10 of 24 Photo by¬† Nina :D 09/30/2020 Great recipe. This recipe was a great hit with my non-mushroom eaters. I added cream cheese. Will definitely make again. 1 2 3 Next You‚Äôll Also Love Easy Chicken Tetrazzini 802 Ratings Noodles 64 Ratings Buffalo Chicken Pasta 7 Ratings Easy Chicken Fettuccine with Sun-Dried Tomatoes 9 Ratings Chicken Milano 2,812 Ratings Creamy Chicken and Tomatillo Verde Pasta Chicken Spaghetti with Rotel 215 Ratings Lemon-Pepper Chicken Pasta 3 Ratings Weeknight Noodle Bowl 5 Ratings Zucchini Noodles and Summer Vegetables with Sweet Pepper Chicken Sausage 7 Ratings Easy One-Pot Chicken Alfredo 5 Ratings Chicken Spaghetti II 388 Ratings Brian's Chicken Sausage Pesto Pasta 7 Ratings Chicken Spaghetti 148 Ratings Chicken and Broccoli Alfredo 595 Ratings Chicken Alfredo with Fettuccini Noodles 298 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices ¬† Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith¬†publishing¬†family. name: Beamish
instructions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook angel hair pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 4 to 5 minutes. Drain pasta and return it to the pot.;Add chopped chicken, condensed soup, diced tomatoes with chile peppers, processed cheese, mushrooms, salt, and pepper. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Cook and stir over low heat until cheese is melted and mixture is heated through, about 5 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios
